DOC.brief_summary: blood draw five years after booster-immunization with TBE vaccine to investigate immunogenicity in children
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Long-Term Immunogenicity in Children and Adolescents Boosted With a New Pediatric TBE Vaccine After Five Years
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers of both sexes aged >1 years at the time of enrollment in V48P4 who participated in studies V48P4E1 and V48P4E2, and who/whose parents or legal guardians are willing to sign informed consent.
DOC.keyword: blood draw five years after booster-immunization with TBE vaccine to investigate immunogenicity in children
